channel.title: Just a simple question about a simple timer
channel.description: i just want to know how to work a simple timer..like i do a command to teleport and it does an emote and 10 seconds later it teleports me.. some one please suggest a way..^_^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 12:33:50 PM[/size][hr]is there anyone who can help me...please...

item.title: Just a simple question about a simple timer
item.dc:creator: @jmaldon jmaldon
item.description:
@jmaldon wrote:

its not a spell…its an emote button.

case 168: //home emote if(emotes == 0) if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { if (actionTimer == 0) { setAnimation(1820); actionTimer = 40; teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; }} else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic
item.source: Just a simple question about a simple timer
